topic.title: How to Select a Language (HTML5 and CSS)

body.p: There are two ways of switching the labels to a specific language:

ul.li: Alter the DITA maps and/or topics to have the xml:lang attribute set to the root element, to one of a supported value (Eg. "fr", "de", "zh", "ru").
If changing the files is not an option, you can alter the value of the transformation parameter default.language to the desired language code.
